MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: B4A550E7-1639-4C9A-A229-31E22B1415E7 title: Sensor orientation description: Sensor data from the Accelerometer, Gyrometer, Compass, Inclinometer, and OrientationSensor classes is defined by their reference axes. These axes are defined by the device's landscape orientation and rotate with the device as the user turns it.
